seo_validation.description: Detect SEO issues that impact search rankings

patterns.pattern: Empty or missing <title> tag
patterns.check: Verify page layout includes title metadata rendering
patterns.learned_from: Found 3 pages with empty titles on 2025-12-31

patterns.pattern: URLs containing 'YOUR-', 'REPLACE-', 'PLACEHOLDER'
patterns.check: Scan for template placeholder text in links
patterns.learned_from: Found YOUR-PROFILE in LinkedIn link on 2025-12-31

patterns.pattern: Posts with AI-generated content must have ai_assisted: true flag
patterns.check: Scan content for AI mentions without disclosure flag
patterns.learned_from: Found 3 posts missing ai_assisted flag on 2025-12-31

patterns.pattern: Article starts with banned throat-clearing phrases
patterns.check: Scan first paragraph for patterns like 'In today\'s world', 'It\'s no secret'
patterns.learned_from: Codified from AGENT_QUALITY_STANDARDS.md on 2026-01-01
patterns.auto_fix: Remove opening sentences with banned patterns

patterns.pattern: Article ends with summary or weak closing
patterns.check: Scan last 3 paragraphs for 'In conclusion', 'remains to be seen', summaries
patterns.learned_from: Codified from AGENT_QUALITY_STANDARDS.md on 2026-01-01
patterns.auto_fix: Replace with definitive prediction or implication

patterns.pattern: Article contains [NEEDS SOURCE] or [UNVERIFIED] markers
patterns.check: Grep for verification flags in article body
patterns.learned_from: Codified from AGENT_QUALITY_STANDARDS.md on 2026-01-01
patterns.auto_fix: Delete unsourced claims or add proper attribution

front_matter_validation.description: NEW: Enforce front matter schema compliance (BLOCKS layer)

patterns.pattern: Front matter missing 'categories' field
patterns.check: schema_validator.py enforces required field
patterns.learned_from: Issue #15: Missing category tag on article page (2026-01-01)
patterns.prevention: Self-validating Writer Agent now checks before returning

patterns.pattern: Front matter missing 'layout' field causes page rendering failure
patterns.check: schema_validator.py enforces required field
patterns.learned_from: Production bug: Pages render without Jekyll layout (2025-12-31)

patterns.pattern: Titles use generic patterns like 'Myth vs Reality', 'Ultimate Guide'
patterns.check: schema_validator.py regex patterns detect generic titles
patterns.learned_from: Codified from AGENT_QUALITY_STANDARDS.md on 2026-01-01
patterns.prevention: Agent prompts explicitly ban generic patterns

patterns.pattern: Date in front matter doesn't match today's date
patterns.check: schema_validator.py compares date to expected_date
patterns.learned_from: Writer Agent sometimes uses dates from research sources
patterns.prevention: Writer prompt explicitly states: Use TODAY\'s date

chart_integration.description: NEW: Validate chart generation and embedding

patterns.pattern: Chart generated but not embedded in article
patterns.check: agent_reviewer.py checks for ![...](chart_path) in article
patterns.learned_from: Issue #16: Charts generated but never embedded (2026-01-01)
patterns.prevention: Self-validating Writer Agent regenerates if chart missing

patterns.pattern: Chart embedded but not referenced in text
patterns.check: agent_reviewer.py scans for 'As the chart shows' or similar
patterns.learned_from: Codified from AGENT_QUALITY_STANDARDS.md on 2026-01-01
patterns.prevention: Writer prompt requires natural chart reference

patterns.pattern: Chart appears twice (featured image + embedded)
patterns.check: Scan for both 'image:' field and markdown embed
patterns.learned_from: Issue #17: Duplicate chart display (2026-01-01)
patterns.prevention: Writer Agent no longer adds 'image:' field

patterns.pattern: Internal links pointing to non-existent pages
patterns.check: Verify all internal links resolve to actual files
patterns.learned_from: Initial skill - common blog issue

patterns.pattern: Font preload resource hints causing warnings
patterns.check: Review preload strategy in layout templates
patterns.learned_from: Found Google Fonts preload warning on 2025-12-31

patterns.pattern: Agent behavior defined by large prompt constants at top of files
patterns.rationale: Makes agent logic explicit, versionable, and reviewable
patterns.check: When modifying agent behavior, edit prompt constants first
patterns.learned_from: Found 9 prompt constants across agent files

patterns.pattern: Editorial board uses weighted persona agents for consensus
patterns.rationale: Simulates diverse stakeholder perspectives with different priorities
patterns.implementation: Each persona has explicit 'what makes you click/scroll past' criteria
patterns.check: New personas must define weight, perspective, and decision criteria
patterns.learned_from: Found 6 personas with weighted voting in editorial_board.py

patterns.pattern: Pipeline stages executed sequentially with data handoffs
patterns.rationale: Each agent specializes in one task, outputs feed next agent
patterns.check: Ensure each agent validates its inputs and outputs structured data
patterns.learned_from: Found 6 specialized agents in pipeline

patterns.pattern: Pipeline stages communicate via JSON files on disk
patterns.rationale: Enables inspection between stages, supports manual intervention
patterns.governance: Humans review JSON outputs before next stage execution
patterns.check: Validate JSON schema compatibility between producer/consumer
patterns.learned_from: Found 3 JSON intermediate files

patterns.pattern: Output paths configurable via environment variables
patterns.rationale: Supports multiple deployment targets (local, blog repo, CI/CD)
patterns.check: Provide sensible defaults when env vars not set
patterns.learned_from: Found OUTPUT_DIR environment variable pattern

patterns.pattern: Prompts explicitly define expected JSON output structure
patterns.rationale: Reduces parsing errors and improves output consistency
patterns.implementation: Include example JSON schema in system prompt
patterns.check: Every agent that returns structured data must specify format
patterns.learned_from: Found structured output specs in economist_agent.py

patterns.pattern: Style constraints explicitly listed as BANNED/FORBIDDEN
patterns.rationale: Learned from manual editing cycles - codified editorial lessons
patterns.check: Update constraint lists based on editor agent rejections
patterns.learned_from: Found 3 explicit constraint sections in economist_agent.py

patterns.pattern: Extract JSON from LLM responses with find/rfind before parsing
patterns.rationale: LLMs may wrap JSON in markdown or explanatory text
patterns.implementation: Find first '{' and last '}', parse substring
patterns.check: Always use try/except around json.loads()
patterns.learned_from: Found defensive parsing in 5 files

patterns.pattern: Research agent flags unverifiable claims with [UNVERIFIED]
patterns.rationale: Maintains credibility, prevents false claims in output
patterns.enforcement: Editor agent rejects articles with [UNVERIFIED] markers
patterns.check: Never publish content with verification flags
patterns.learned_from: Found [UNVERIFIED] flagging system in research/editor flow

patterns.pattern: All agents use Anthropic Claude API via shared client
patterns.rationale: Consistent model selection, easier rate limiting, unified error handling
patterns.check: Create client once, pass to agents - don't create per-request
patterns.learned_from: Found Anthropic client usage in 5 files

patterns.pattern: Validation agents learn from each run using skills system
patterns.rationale: Zero-config improvement, patterns persist across runs
patterns.check: Call skills_manager.learn_pattern() when new issues discovered
patterns.learned_from: Found SkillsManager implementation with pattern persistence

patterns.pattern: Manual review gates between pipeline stages
patterns.check: Never auto-publish - require explicit human approval
patterns.learned_from: Found multi-stage review pattern in pipeline
